channel.description: Recent content in Murder, Mystery & Makeup on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: Terrible Teen Twins or Victims? - Jas and Tas Whiteland | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends, happy Tuesday! I am really interested in hearing what you all have to say about this week's episode. The twins obviously shouldn’t have done that to their mom, but…it’s not like they were in the best situation. Is this really a crime of passion…or just teenage rebellion that went too far? Watch the original video here and don't forget to subscribe to my YouTube @BarileySarian! Visit https://www.

item.title: Murderer, Cannibal, or Saint?? - Karl Denke | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends, happy Tuesday! Today’s story is wild. I mean the events of this story forced a whole town to stop eating meat for years. And that’s just part of it. Papa Denke was a truly disturbed man. Hope you have a great rest of your week and I'll be seeing you very soon xo Bailey Sarian Watch the original video here and don't forget to subscribe to my YouTube @BarileySarian!

item.title: Murder or Self Defense? Motel Murder - Robert Moorman | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Today’s story is about Robert Moorman. Stories like this are always tough. I mean, Robert had a really hard life, but… he still killed someone. But the mother? Idk… something funky was going on there. Love you so much and please be safe out there! Hope to be seeing you very soon. x o Bailey Sarian Watch the original video here and don't forget to subscribe to my YouTube @BaileySarian!

item.title: The Suspish Sitter- Helen Patricia Moore | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Here’s another Australia story for you about Helen Patricia Moore. This story is just… awful. I mean, Helen’s poor mom. And what is up with Claymore? Love you so much and please be safe out there! Hope to be seeing you very soon. x o Bailey Sarian Watch the original video here and don't forget to subscribe to my YouTube @BaileySarian! Tik Tok: https://bit.ly/3e3jL9v Instagram: http://bit.ly/2nbO4PR

item.title: Would You Kill For Love? David & Catherine Birnie | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Today’s story is a rough one. I mean, they all are, but, you get it. This couple… was sick. Really no other way to put it. David and Catherine Birnie were awful people and did some awful things. I hope I did the story justice, but it was pretty graphic. Love you so much and please be safe out there! Hope to be seeing you very soon.

item.title: Witches in Salem or Something Much Darker? The Salem Witch Trials | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Today I wanted to talk about the Salem Witch Trials and I won’t lie, I learned so much! Did it really have anything to do with Witches after all?? Well, I ain't holding my breath! Love you so much and please be safe out there! Hope to be seeing you very soon. x o Bailey Sarian Watch the original video here and don't forget to subscribe to my YouTube @BaileySarian!

item.title: Satanic Panic or A Cult Hidden In Town? Very Peculiar Unsolved Mystery | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! This story is so strange. I mean, Terrie had signs that there was foul play, how come NOBODY in a town that small said anything that lead to an arrest? People were talking, a little too much. Love you so much and please be safe out there! Hope to be seeing you very soon. x o Bailey Sarian Watch the original video here and don't forget to subscribe to my YouTube @BaileySarian!

item.title: Vanished. Where is Emma Fillipoff? Missing Since 2013 | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Hope you guys are staying safe and healthy out there. Today I wanted to talk about Emma Fillipoff who went missing in 2013 and still hasn’t been found, even though there have been MANY sightings. If you have information regarding Emma Fillipoffs whereabouts Call Crime Stoppers @ 1-800-222-TIPS(8477) I love and appreciate you guys so much. Hope you have a wonderful rest of your week and you Make Good Choices x o

item.title: The Sugar Baby Cannibal | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Hope you had a happy and safe week/weekend. And that you had a happy and safe Thanksgiving. Now that all that good food has digested it's time to tell you a story that will really make your tummy turn. We're talking about Omiama Nelson. She's like if Ed Gein and Catherine Knight had a baby who just really did not like Thanksgiving. That'll all make sense after you listen.

item.title: The Dark Story Behind A UFO "Religious" Group - Heavens Gate | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Hope you are all staying safe and healthy out there. Today on Murder, Mystery & Makeup, I wanted to talk about Heavens Gate, ooohhhweee. This one is always highly requested! Now to be fair, I keep my videos pretty, simple? Basic? Straight to the point, so I do often leave out small details that I feel don't contribute to the overall story. What I am getting at is, you can always deep dive on your own and read more about these stories.

item.title: *CAUGHT* Four Decades Later - Untold Story Of The Golden State Killer | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi my friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day so far. Today on Murder, Mystery & Makeup, I wanted to talk about a highly requested story, the GSK aka EAR aka Original Night Stalker aka EARONS aka many more. I am currently reading the book I'll Be Gone In The Dark by Michelle McNamara and wooooow weeee! Im not kidding, I have been having nightmares at night. This dude was just AWFUL.

item.title: A String Of Really Bad Luck? American Monster Death Row Granny | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Today on Murder, Mystery & Makeup, I wanted to talk about Margie Velma Bullard Barfield. Whew weee, she sure did do some damage for a long time. I believe all the fires, were her. All the husbands/boyfriends, were her. The people she took “care of”, yeah, I think she was responsible for all the chaos that was happening around her. Sad that it took so long for anyone to catch on.

item.title: Candy Man - The Man Who Killed Halloween | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Today's Murder, Mystery & Makeup story is about The Candyman, an awful human being, who really sucked. ALSO, there is another guy who was also named The Candyman , I'm sure people will let me know about that dude, he was somethinnnn else! Honestly, there wasn’t much background info on him nor many pictures of , much of anything. Do you believe the death penalty was a little much or no?

item.title: Haunted Bunk Beds? The Tallman's Haunted Dream Home | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! I've gotten a good amount of people asking for me to do a paranormal story (ya ya yeahhh you can mock ppl for saying this, but I seriously have been getting a lot..hahahah). I know I have talked about true crime most of the time here on Murder, Mystery & Makeup, but I figured since it's October I could throw one in for some spooky time. Believer or non believer, life is too short.

item.title: The Halloween Love Triangle and The Mysterious "L" Word | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Today on Murder, Mystery & Makeup, I wanted to talk about Peter and Betty Fabiano. Now if this doesn't sound like a Lifetime movie, then idk what one is. This isn’t lifetime though, its real life and boy did they get off the hook pretty easily. I Love and appreciate you guys so much and thank you for liking and subscribing, it means more than you know.

item.title: Creature That Terrorized West Virginia - The True Story of Mothman | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi my spooky ookie friends, happy Monday! Hope you are all having a good week so far, hey as good as it can be right now! For the month of October I wanted to talk about some spooky stories and urban myths while creating fun Halloween looks. Woooo I know you’ve probably heard the Mothman story before but hey, I figured why not! I hope you enjoy this Murder, Mystery & Makeup episode.

item.title: Jonestown Massacre [Apocalyptic Cult] Who Was Jim Jones? | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Today on Murder, Mystery & Makeup, I wanted to talk about Jim Jones and what was going on with his whole situation. This could easily be a 3 part series, there are so many more people and factors that came into play as well, but I wanted to keep it simple and focus on Jim and his life. Honestly, it would've gotten so confusing QUICK if I started throwing all these different names at you.

item.title: On The Run Sugar Baby or *STRANGE* Coincidences? | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends, how are you today? I hope you are having a wonderful day so far! I have really been enjoying these stories from long ago, the women sure were a little cray, to say the least. But I must say, there were a lot of strange coincidences going on around Louise's life, wasn't there? She was the definition of suspish to say the least. Thank you for tuning into Murder, Mystery & Makeup.

item.title: A Stroll Down Lovers Lane The Hall-Mills Mystery | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Today on Murder, Mystery & Makeup, I wanted to talk about the Hall-Mills Mystery. It's an interesting story and sadly left unsolved. I think we all have an idea of who it could be but I would love to hear your thoughts and theories down below. Thank you so much for all your love and support, I love you guys. Hope to be seeing you very soon.

item.title: Donald "Pee Wee" Gaskins - Wow, He Was The Actual Worst! | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! I hope you are having a good day so far. Today on Murder, Mystery & Makeup, I wanted to talk about Donald Gaskins aka, Pee Wee! He was an awful person who got wayyyyyy too many chances. I mean it was quite ridiculous how many chances this guy got. The justice system should be held accountable as well if you ask me, but what the heck to I know.

item.title: Casey Anthony - 1 Of The Most Hated Women In America | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Today on Murder, Mystery & Makeup, I thought I would do a highly requested story on Casey Anthony. Need I say more? Exactly. Love and appreciate you guys so much and I hope you have a great rest of your day! x o Bailey Sarian Watch the original video here and don't forget to subscribe to my YouTube @BaileySarian! FOLLOW ME AROUND Tik Tok : https://bit.ly/3e0S55i

item.title: Gertrude Baniszewski - The Worst Lady I've Heard Of | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope your week/weekend was fantastic. Todays story is low key really heavy and sad and ugh, just awful. I kept getting recommended this over and over again so finally I caved and decided to share the story about Sylvia Likens. I definitely think in the future I just need to stay away from stories like these, they mess with me way too much. Don't get me wrong all the stories are awful , but this one was just super awful.

item.title: The Comic Book Creator Gone Mad?? Trust Fund Killer - Blake Leibel | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! So I came across today's story in one of my late night google hole situations and WOW. I mean, wow. I personally had never heard of this one? Have you?? Hope you have a wonderful rest of your day and you make good choices!! I love and appreciate you xo Bailey Sarian Make sure to check out the original YouTube video and subscribe to my channel @BaileySarian!

item.title: A Jealous, Bad Actor or Monster? The Dark Case Of Daniel Wozniak | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day today. Todays story is just bizarre. BIZARRE. What in the world was this dude thinking?? Seriously? Ive got a lot of questions not many answers though. love and appreciate you more than you know. I hope you have a great rest of your week ahead. xo Bailey Sarian Transcript

item.title: Intruder or Murder? The Strange Case Of Robert Wone | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day today. This story is strange and so so so sad !!! It still remains unsolved. I personally feel like , all signs point to the guys in the house. We may never know what truly happened inside that townhouse but Katherine and Roberts family deserves closure and justice for what happened to Robert. Let me know what you think and if you have any theories.

item.title: Inside Sean Sellers Messed Up Head - When Satan Comes To Town | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi my friends, hope you are having a wonderful day so far. Hope your weekend was swell and grand, but I am so excited to be here because we are talking about a very controversial story. One where, I'm not sure what I think lol. I appreciate you so much, I hope you have a wonderful and safe week ahead. lets have a good day today!! xo Bailey Sarian Transcript

item.title: John Christie - 10 Rillington Place, House Of Horrors | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Hope you are all staying safe and healthy out there. Today I wanted to talk about John Christie. WOOOWWWW.... what a sad sad man. I really don't know what else to say here hahahah.. What are your thoughts? Hope you all have a wonderful rest of your day, Love and appreciate you guys so much!! I hope to be seeing you very soon x o Bailey Sarian Transcript

item.title: The Ken & Barbie Couple - A Deal With The Devil | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! I hope you are having a good day so far, today I wanted to talk about this highly recommended story, seriously it's asked about every day. Haha. I thought I knew the whole shebang but turns out I sure did not! Such awful, terrible people, and I believe Karla got off way too easy! I hope you have a wonderful rest of your day ahead and I hope to be seeing you very soon.

item.title: Edmund Kemper III - Wannabe Cop Turns Deadly | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day today. Today I wanted to talk about Edmund Kemper III. Isn’t it kind of strange how most of these people we have been talking about have very similar names? What's that all about? Anyways, the dude was a problem. Really, that’s what we can say about him. Please be safe out there, try and make some good choices! I love and appreciate you all so much and I will be seeing you very very soon.

item.title: Sex, Drugs & Cannibalism - What Happened to Rose Larner | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day so far. Today I wanted to talk about what happened to Rose Larner, poor girl. I hope a new trial doesnt go through but will keep you updated if anything happens! Love and appreciate you guys so much and I will be seeing you very soon! x o Bailey Sarian Check out the original video on YouTube and make sure you subscribe to my channel @BaileySarian!

item.title: The Night Stalker - Richard Ramirez | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! I wanted to talk about the Night Stalker, not really much I can say other than, wow? I don't know. Sometimes I just don't have the words. Please be safe out there. I love and appreciate you so much, take care of YOU. I hope you have a wonderful week ahead and I will be seeing you very soon!! x o Bailey Sarian Here's the original Murder, Mystery & Makeup video if you want to check it out!

item.title: Amato Case - Cam Girl Obsession Turns Deadly | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! We’ve got a long one! I went down a rabbit hole on this story. Thank you for always sending recommendations my way, I so greatly appreciate you guys for doing that. Love and appreciate you guys so much and I hope to be seeing you very soon. x o Bailey Sarian Transcript

item.title: Springfield 3 - Missouri's Mysterious Disappearance | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description HI FRIENDS!! Hope you are having a wonderful day so far. Missed you. Love you. Appreciate you. Today I wanted to talk about a highly requested story. This one is rough because how do three people just VANISH?! It makes no sense, right?? Theres NOTHING. NOTHING!! No answers. So strange. Ugh. Would love to hear your thoughts and opinions. Make good choices please! xo Bailey Sarian P.S. Make sure to check out my YouTube @BaileySarian!

item.title: Tulsa Race Massacre - What Happened?! | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope you have been staying happy and healthy out there, big hugs all around. Today I wanted to talk about the Tulsa Race Mass. Sad sad story and it was just the 101 year anniversary ! Love and appreciate you guys so much and I will be seeing you very soon. x o Bailey Sarian P.S. Make sure you check out my YouTube @BaileySarian! Transcript

item.title: Twisted Love Triangle - Missing Marine Wife Living A Double Life? | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! I hope you are having a wonderful day so far. Today I wanted to talk about the overdramatic Chris Lee. I am telling you, there is something up with Chris' and Nicoles. I mean CMON. I would love to hear your thoughts. Let's have a good week ahead, shall we? I love and appreciate you more than you know, and I hope to be seeing you very soon.

item.title: Candy Mossler - Incestuous Love Affair Turns Deadly | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Hope you are all staying safe and healthy out there. Today today today!!! I wanted to talk about Candy Mossler and wow, her whole situation. Stories like these just get under my skin! Let me know your thoughts down below. I love and appreciate you guys so much and I hope you know that. Have a great rest of your day and I’ll be seeing you very sooooon!

item.title: Gypsy Rose Blanchard - Munchausen by proxy or Killer? | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hello friends! Hope you all are having a wonderful day so far. Today we talk about Gypsy Rose Blanchard and her mom Dee Dee. Its a very interesting, sad, weird, strange, wtf, story. Seriously. Would love to hear what you think about the case . I know this is a long one, i tried my best to cut out the stuff that wasn't really relevant but, there is just SO MUCH.

item.title: Bizarre Jenny Jones Case - Secret Crush Revealed Goes Wrong | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Today I wanted to talk about Scoot Amedure and what happened to him after appearing on the Jenny Jones Show. This case is sad and their defense is/was awful. Thank you for hanging out with me today and I appreciate you guys so much for sending recommendations my way and always coming by, it really means more than you know. Have a wonderful rest of your day and hope to be seeing you very soon.

item.title: Issei Sagawa - He Might Be More Terrifying Than You Think | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends hope you are having a wonderful day today! It's been awhile since we've talked about the ppl eaters. He is definitely a unique one, I am not sure what else to say. Let me know what you think down below and if you loved this eyeshadow look as much as I did. Love and appreciate you all so much for watching! Hope to be seeing you real soon xo

item.title: The Baby Snatcher - Did She Deserve It Or A Victim Herself? | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi my friends, hope you are having a great day today! Today I wanted to talk about a real suspish odd story, its quite sad really. Just all around sad. Would love to hear your guys thoughts down below. Hope you will have a wonderful rest of your week and yes I will be seeing you next week! yay. Love and appreciate you so much! Make Good Choices

item.title: Arthur Shawcross - The Genesee River Monster | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day today and I just wanted to say a big thank you to all of you guys who constantly send love my way. I love and appreciate you guys so much!!! Anywho, today I wanted to talk about Arthur Shawcross and just, yeah. I mean, what can you say at this point? Gross human. I would love to hear your thoughts down below.

item.title: Katherine Knight - The Woman Hannibal Lecter | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description HELLO True Crime & MakeUp Lovers ! Hi friends , hope you had a wonderful weekend! I wanted to talk about this story, and boy, it's a doozy. Katherine Knight was insane, literally, insane, no other words to describe her. What are your thoughts? Doesn’t it sound like a movie ??? This is why I don’t leave my house, I know there are these people just roaming around out there !

item.title: The Devil Worshipper, Pazuzu - Satanist In The Suburbs | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! I've actually gotten a request to talk about Pazuzu and bunch of times within this last week, it's nuts. But big thank you to Samy Aguilar for recommending this one. Honestly, Pazuzu was.. something ELSE, I really dont know what else to say about that. What can we learn here? Sometimes I just really dont know! What I do know is, I love and appreciate you guys sooooo much and please be safe out there.

item.title: Lawrence Bittaker and Roy Norris - The Creepy White Van & Tool Box | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends Hope you are having a wonderful day today! This week I wanted to talk about Lawrence Bittaker and Roy Norris. I cannot get my mouth to say Roy properly , so I said Norris, sorry about it but, that’s the only way I could continue on. Please be safe out there, seriously. Love and appreciate you all for the constant kind words you send my way and I hope you are able to have a great week ahead.

item.title: Tim Mclean- The Chilling Greyhound Bus Case - Justice Served? | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day today so far. Today I wanted to talk about Tim Mclean and what in the world happened to him on the greyhound bus. The whole story is strange. I hope the family and passengers get the justice they deserve but most of all are able to heal and move forward. Love and appreciate you guys so much and I hope to be seeing you very soon

item.title: Longest Case in Australia History - Family Court Chaos | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Today I wanted to talk about Andrea and Leonard Warwick and their relationship and how it turned into the biggest and longest case in Australia History. Hope you have a wonderful rest of your day and I will be seeing you very very soon!! Love and appreciate you guys SOOO MUCH xo Bailey Sarian Domestic Abuse Help : https://www.thehotline.org/help/ Reach out , you can get help and YOU CAN get out.

item.title: 5 STRANGE Unsolved Missing Cases | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Today I wanted to dabble in the MYSTERY side of things and talk about 5 different very STRANGEEEE unsolved cases. Let me know what you think, do you like this format? Any theories as to what might have happened? xo Bailey Sarian P.S. Check out Murder, Mystery & Makeup on my YouTube @BaileySarian Transcript

item.title: Jose Luis Calva Zepeda - The Cannibal Poet | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day so far. Today I wanted to talk about Jose Luis Calva Zepeda and his whole… mess. There was a language barrier so, some things were a little unclear. Overall though, very sad story and I hope all of the families are at peace and have their closure. I hope you have a wonderful day today, please be safe out there!

item.title: The Awful Gary Heidnik - Church Cult & Cellar Girls | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day so far. Today I wanted to talk about Gary Michael Heidnik who was a real piece of crap, thats the nice way of putting it. The outcome of this story is surprising and makes me cry, every time. Please be safe out there, I love and appreciate you guys so much! xo Bailey Sarian Transcript

item.title: Sante and Kenny Kimes - Like Mother, Like Son | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day so far. Today I wanted to talk about Sante and Kenny Kimes who were, busy, VERRRYYYY busy. Would love to hear your thoughts about Kenny and his sentencing. ALSO, I cut out SO MUCH more to this story but again, things were getting SO confusing with all these names being thrown around, I just decided to keep it straight to the point and not get too confusing.

item.title: The Unabomber - Who Was Ted Kaczynski? Inside His Mind | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day today so far. Today I wanted to talk about Theodore Kaczynski and his very smart brain but awful things he did. Now I said a couple of times that I agreed with him on some points, but I forgot to say, hey man, I don’t agree with all the things he said. I started to skim parts of it and now I’m worried there’s some awful nonsense in there that now sounds like me saying “YA I AGREE!

item.title: John List - Family Man To Americas Most Wanted? 18 Year Case | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Today I wanted to talk about John List and wow, no words. We need to bring back Americas Most Wanted. I don't have TV so if its still on, forgive me, but dang if it wasn’t for that show , who knows what would’ve happened ! I love and appreciate you guys so much, please be safe out there! Love love love you. xo Bailey Sarian Transcript

item.title: 300 year old werewolf? Richardson Family Case | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Today's story is about the Richardson Family. A very, very sad story and I would love to hear your thoughts about it. Hope you have a wonderful rest of your day and I will be seeing you very very soon xo Bailey Sarian Transcript

item.title: Mitrice Richardson - Police Cover Up? The System Failed | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! I wanted to talk about Mitrice Richardson, I feel like her story is pretty important. Her case got completely dismissed and not taken seriously, WHY?! WHY would they let her leave at 12:30 am without any car, phone, wallet, nothing?!?! Why was she arrested in the first place? Why why why why why. So many why’s and not enough answers here. There is also a LOT more to this story but I just couldn’t fit it in to one video, this one turned out way longer than expected.

item.title: Cassie Jo Stoddart - Scream Inspired Case | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day so far. Today I wanted to talk about Cassie Jo Stoddart and her sad and terrible case. Please be safe out there! I love you guys so much and appreciate all the love you send my way. I hope to be seeing you very soon xo Bailey Sarian P.S. If you haven't already, check me out on YouTube @BaileySarian Transcript

item.title: Rebecca Zahau - What REALLY happened in the Spreckels Mansion? | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description The death of Rebecca Zahau, first determined as a suicide, reveals further evidence and suspicions that points to a murder. Additional information regarding the case is included in the description of the original MMM YouTube video where you can find here. If you haven't already, check me out on YouTube @BaileySarian! Transcript

item.title: The ToyBox Mystery - David Parker Ray | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day so far. We've got a super long one today, we shall see how this one goes. I just have to say there was a lot more to this case, but I gave you a simple summary of it just because I know it can get a bit overwhelming. Unfortunately we will never really know how many people were victims and that is truly unfortunate.

item.title: Edward Gein - REAL LIFE Silence Of The Lambs?! Body Snatcher | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Today I wanted to talk about Edward Gein, a man who inspired many movies, documentaries, and books. His story is a strange one, hard to believe and honestly, what was the switch that went off in his brain to take him crimes to the next level? Hope you guys have a wonderful day today, I love and appreciate you all so much!! I will be seeing you guys very soon

item.title: UNSOLVED 4 Murders- Did They Find The Man Responsible Too Late? | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope you are having a wonderful day today. This story is quite sad and still remains “unsolved”. Hopefully one day someone will come forward and give the families the closure they deserve. Let me know what you think down below and I will be seeing you guys very soon! Love and appreciate you guys so much x o Bailey Sarian If you haven't already, check me out on YouTube @BaileySarian!

item.title: Thrown Overboard or Cruise Line Cover Up? Rebecca Corium | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description HELLO Friends ! I wanted to talk today about Rebecca Corium and her disappearance. The story is odd, you never get straight answers and ONCE AGAIN a big company just ignores and shuts down requests from the family to further investigate. There are also many other reports of what was heard/seen but its hard to verify what is true or just rumors. There was also a flip flop found that Disney said belonged to Rebecca but was later proven to not be hers.

item.title: It WAS a Cover Up: LaVena Johnson | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description HELLO Friends ! I wanted to talk today about LaVena Johnson and how her family still fights for her. This case is so sad and I just want to give the family a big big hug. There is A LOT MORE to this case that I left out, I just tried my best to not make it too long, but please read more about the case within the links provided.

item.title: Entitled Pretty Teen Kills Parents? Or Nah? | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description HELLO True Crime & MakeUp Lovers ! Hi friends , hope you had a wonderful weekend and happy MONDAY ! Today we are talking about Suzane Von Ricthofen , her entitlement and how money caused her to snap. Love and appreciate you all so much and I will be seeing you very soon x o Bailey Sarian Transcript

item.title: Brainwashed? A Deal Gone Wrong? Charles Manson | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi my friends! I have always gotten suggestions to pleaseee cover this story and here we are. My brain got turned into mush watching all the interviews and reading all the articles, I still don't even fully understand what the heck was going on! Would love to hear your thoughts! Hope you have a great rest of your week and I will being seeing you next Monday, woooot. x o

item.title: Wealthy Mother Tries To "Fix" Son with Incest - YEAH WTF | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Today I wanted to talk about lame ol Barbara and what an awful person she was. I mean, I feel bad for her because she seemed to have a rough life, but damn, did she really need to ruin everyone elses? RIP to poor Tony, yes he made some bad choices but he did not deserve the treatment he received from his family and most of all his own MOTHER.

item.title: Death By Delicious Chocolate - Cordelia Botkins was WILD | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! I hope you are having a good day so far! Oh todays story I found FASCINATING! Was Cordelia a terrible person? yeah for sure but she was also just doing her thing no matter what everyone thought and that my friends is pretty badass. lol. I would love to hear what you think! Sorry if this is a little too long! Sometimes there's so much information I never know what to cut out.

item.title: Jeffrey Dahmer. Inside His Messed Up Mind & How He Almost Got Away. | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi friends! We’ve got a long one! Thank you for always sending recommendations my way, I so greatly appreciate you guys for doing that. Some of the story I did cut out for time purposes, but over all we got the major stuff covered. Um, not much you can really say about him. You know what’s crazy though ? His upbringing seems so tame compared to lots of others we’ve talked about here and he was REALLY BAD.

item.title: The Cannibal Cafe? Murder or Volunteer? | Murder, Mystery & Makeup
item.description: Podcast Description Hi Friends! Hope your day is off to a good start. Today I wanted to talk about Armin Meiwes and what the hell was going on over there, I mean he was trying to cook sausage and eat it, I mean, yep he did that. Did he REALLY deserve the sentencing he got if someone WILLINGLY participated? Weird case right? Least he’s vegan now, that’s good. Hope you have a wonderful day today, make good choices and let me know who you want me to talk about next week!
